wobani.toolbox

Class OpenAl

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.toolbox.OpenAl

  • public class OpenAl
extends java.lang.Object
    Set of commonly used OpenAL functions.

      • release

        public static void release()
        Releases the OpenAL context and the used audio device. After calling this method, you can't use any audio related actions.
